name: hyperspace-hole
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Bypasses and removes any protection effect on the target.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears
right next to the target and strikes. This
also hits a target using Protect or Detect.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:

right next to the target and strikes. This
also hits a target using Protect or Detect.
